techmeme.title: The three most-downloaded PS5 games for April in North America and Europe were all Microsoft titles: Minecraft, the Oblivion remaster, and Forza Horizon 5 (Andrew Webster/The Verge)
Amazon's Zoox says it temporarily paused all driverless vehicle operations after a crash in Las Vegas on April 8 and issued a software recall for 270 robotaxis (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
ServiceNow launches ServiceNow CRM to take on Salesforce and automate many common workflow steps and "human middleware" with AI (Larry Dignan/Constellation Research)
News reader Particle launches on the web, featuring news headlines and AI summaries, key quotes, links to sources, and reader questions answered by AI (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Google unveils AI Max for Search ad campaigns, a suite of AI-powered targeting and creative enhancements, rolling out to advertisers in beta later this month (Kendra Barnett/Adweek)
